column4: hey all .. im trying to get a file into my /usr/lib/ directory .. but i keep getting told i dont have permission to the directory .. what do i need to do?
ive tried alt+f2 and running the program ive been trying to use to move.. didnt work
you need to be root maybe, using sudo to do it. but you should probably not be messing with that unless you know what your doing more. Why do you want to put files there?
